entries.closingbroadcast_1: <<Alliance Transmission: Control, Alder Six-Two. We are gear up and on our way to our next rally. May the Force be with you..>>
entries.closingbroadcast_0: <<Imperial Transmission: Shuttle ST321, your departure vector is right six-nine-three. Command station out.>>
entries.areabroadcast_1: <<Incoming Alliance Transmission: Ground control, this is shuttle Alder Six-Two. We have the Princess on board and are coming in for a landing.>>
entries.areabroadcast_0: <<Incoming Imperial Transmission: Command station, this is ST321, code clearance blue. We're starting our approach.>>
entries.dialogue_1_3_11: Friends of the Alliance, I wish you good luck, and may the Force be with you.
entries.dialogue_1_3_10: In our pursuit of peace, we must sometimes embrace conflict.
entries.dialogue_1_3_9: I have been authorized to call for open attacks on all Imperial loyalists and Dark Jedi.
entries.dialogue_1_3_8: To any who still hold allegiance to the Empire, I extend this word of caution:  Beware.  Your days are few.  No evil can survive where justice and peace take root.
entries.dialogue_1_3_7: To any who oppose the Empire, I extend this invitation.  Join us.  Help us.
entries.dialogue_1_3_6: And if we control the cities, there's no end to the good we can do.
entries.dialogue_1_3_5: Every Rebel base brings us that much closer to control of the cities.
entries.dialogue_1_3_4: To that end, friends and allies, I call upon you to establish Rebel bases and outposts all through the outlying areas of this region.
entries.dialogue_1_3_3: The Rebellion must have safe haven, in order to grow, thrive, and overthrow this evil Empire.
entries.dialogue_1_3_2: If we do not oppose the Empire now, we shall be pushed into the farthest reaches of the Outer Rim, or rounded up like criminals.
entries.dialogue_1_3_1: This is our most desperate hour.
entries.dialogue_1_2_11: May the force be with you all.
entries.dialogue_1_2_10: Friends of the Rebellion, you are my only hope.
entries.dialogue_1_2_9: If we continue to fight and build and persevere, even the might of the Empire cannot crush our spirits.
entries.dialogue_1_2_8: From there, we can gain the trust and cooperation of the populace, and control the very cities themselves!
entries.dialogue_1_2_7: Establish new Rebel bases in the outlying country, as many as you can.
entries.dialogue_1_2_6: We can control this sector if we band together and fight.
entries.dialogue_1_2_5: Take the battle against them to the very streets of the city.
entries.dialogue_1_2_4: All Imperials and Dark Jedi must be confronted and defeated!
entries.dialogue_1_2_3: Rise up and fight, my friends!
entries.dialogue_1_2_2: Today we draw a line in the sand, and declare that the Empire will rule us no more.
entries.dialogue_1_2_1: Friends of the Rebellion, hear my call to action.
entries.dialogue_0_3_10: Pray that does not come to pass, for I have little sympathy for failure.
entries.dialogue_0_3_9: Should you fail to achieve this goal, I may be forced to return to this dismal planet, and oversee its administration.
entries.dialogue_0_3_8: And then, we shall be unstoppable.
entries.dialogue_0_3_7: Once we have gained control of the countryside, we shall consolidate our control of the cities.
entries.dialogue_0_3_6: And so, the Emperor commands all his allies to establish military bases and outposts in the outlying areas.
entries.dialogue_0_3_5: To achieve absolute control of this sector, we must control the cities.
entries.dialogue_0_3_4: The Emperor has tolerated their presence long enough.  But even his graciousness and forgiveness has a limit.
entries.dialogue_0_3_3: And any of the so-called Jedi Knights are to be similarly dealt with.
entries.dialogue_0_3_2: From now on, all members of the Rebellion are to be terminated on sight.  No mercy shall be shown.
entries.dialogue_0_3_1: Citizens of the Empire, I have come to declare an end to the Rebellion.
entries.dialogue_0_2_11: I suggest you carry them out without further delay.
entries.dialogue_0_2_9: Do not disappoint him.  I needn't remind you, the Emperor is not as forgiving as I am.
entries.dialogue_0_2_8: Once this perimeter has been established, he wishes that the cities be controlled unilaterally by the Empire.
entries.dialogue_0_2_7: In addition, the Emperor commands that you establish military bases and outposts in the outlying regions, so that insurrections can be crushed immediately.
entries.dialogue_0_2_6: Any illegal sympathizers or Jedi are to be shot on sight, no questions asked.
entries.dialogue_0_2_5: From this day forward, no Rebel presence shall be tolerated.
entries.dialogue_0_2_4: He wishes this insignificant uprising to be crushed, and quickly.
entries.dialogue_0_2_3: The Rebellion has too long been a thorn in the side of progress and order.
entries.dialogue_0_2_1: Greetings, citizens of the Empire.  I bring you dark news.
entries.dialogue_1_1_11: May the Force be with you all.
entries.dialogue_1_1_10: Our freedom and future is in your hands.
entries.dialogue_1_1_9: That is all I can ask. Be careful and fight well.
entries.dialogue_1_1_8: I call upon you all to do what is right. We must fight this evil here and now.
entries.dialogue_1_1_7: Once we have the support of the smaller towns, we will see the populace rise to support us.
entries.dialogue_1_1_6: We will establish Rebel bases on this planet, beacons of hope and justice.
entries.dialogue_1_1_5: First we must fight Imperial oppression in the outlying areas.
entries.dialogue_1_1_4: Peace must be restored, and so, we must band together and fight.
entries.dialogue_1_1_3: Dark Jedi and others known to fight for the Empire wander freely though our cities.
entries.dialogue_1_1_2: The Empire has ruled us with fear and lies long enough.
entries.dialogue_1_1_1: Friends and allies of the Rebellion:  The end of tyranny begins today...
entries.dialogue_0_1_10: I will make sure the Emperor knows of your loyalty.
entries.dialogue_0_1_9: I have seen all that is necessary.
entries.dialogue_0_1_8: Allowing the rebellion to establish control will not be tolerated.
entries.dialogue_0_1_7: Only by establishing Imperial bases across this planet, we can achieve our goal of controlling the cities and crushing all resistance.
entries.dialogue_0_1_6: If we are able to control enough of the outlying areas, we will also control the cities.
entries.dialogue_0_1_5: To bring law and order to the cities we must first control the outlying areas by establishing a military presence in the form of outposts and bases.
entries.dialogue_0_1_4: Effective immediately, known Rebels and all Jedi will be shot on sight by Imperial troops.
entries.dialogue_0_1_2: For too long has this Rebellion remained in our midst, but no longer will such an affront be tolerated.
entries.dialogue_0_1_1: Today marks a turning point in this Galactic Civil War...
